0010101010110010 1010011100101011 0 -> sum: 1101000111011101, cout: 0
0110000101110101 1111110101100010 0 -> sum: 0101111011010111, cout: 1
1000100001101001 1001101001110111 0 -> sum: 0010001011100000, cout: 1
0111101111001101 1011111110010110 0 -> sum: 0011101101100011, cout: 1
0110001110111000 0010000101100100 1 -> sum: 1000010100011101, cout: 0
0011101000111010 0100010001000110 0 -> sum: 0111111010000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
